name: BlackXT's GitHub page
body:
# Welcome

## My projects:
[pipes.sh](http://blackxt.github.io/pipes.sh) - A pipes style terminal screensaver.   
[NullidentdMod](http://blackxt.github.io/nullidentdmod) - A bare minimum identd server with opt userid.   

## My sites:
[Craft (hub)](http://www.craft.net.br/) - Central site.   
[RaspberryLove](https://github.com/RaspberryLove) - RaspberryPi projects with my gf.   
[Steam](http://steamcommunity.com//id/acidhub/) - Me on Steam.   
[AUR Packages](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/?SeB=m&K=AcidHub) - My packs in Arch User Repository.   
[HTML5 Tests](http://web.craft.net.br/Tests/) - Testarea for HTML5.   

Bye.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
